blue-media-quick-transfer-details.title: Quick transfer - Make a transfer using the details below
blue-media-quick-transfer-details.subtitle: Log in to your bank account. Copy and paste the data into the transfer. It is important that the data is the same as, do not change the amount, title, etc.

modal.title: Confirm the transaction on your bank's app
modal.errorTitle: Unfortunately something went wrong... Please try again
modal.helpInfo: Want to find out how to use BLIK payments? Check the manual here.

error.invalidBlikCode: Incorrect BLIK code. Enter the correct BLIK code, which you will find in your bank's app. Check the manual here.
error.blikCodeNotProvided: Enter the correct BLIK code, which you will find in your bank's app. Check the manual here.
error.generalError: Unfortunately, an unexpected payment error occurred. Please try again or contact the shop support.

error.VIOLATION::IS_BLUE_MEDIA_APPLE_PAY_NOT_S: Apple Pay is not available on this device.
